summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Section 15.16.030, Title 15, Street and Sidewalk Use, Sections 23.32.016, 23.41.004, 23.41.012, 23.43.040, 23.45.018, 23.47.028, 23.48.032, 23.49.018, 23.49.332, 23.50.002, 23.53.020, 23.55.036, 23.66.130, 23.66.170, 23.76.006, 23.84.016, 23.84.024, 23.84.036, and Chapter 23.49, Title 23, Land Use Code, and Section 25.05.675, Title 25, Environmental Policies, to correct typographical errors and inaccurate citations, add code provisions inadvertently omitted from previously approved legislation, and clarify regulations; and repealing Section 7.16.020, an obsolete Title 7, Consumer Protection provision.
